class.name: ocgd_iges_reader
class.brief_description: A reader for importing IGES (.iges, .igs) CAD files using OpenCASCADE.
class.description: The ocgd_iges_reader provides functionality to import IGES (Initial Graphics Exchange Specification) files into OpenCASCADE shape objects. IGES is a widely used CAD data exchange format that supports complex geometry, surfaces, and solid models. This reader supports loading assemblies, parts, colors, names, layer information, and various IGES entities with configurable precision settings.

method.name: new_reader
method.description: Creates a new IGES reader instance with default settings.

method.name: load_file
method.description: Loads an IGES file and returns the imported shape. Uses default import options.

method.name: load_file_with_options
method.description: Loads an IGES file with custom import options. The options dictionary can contain keys like "precision", "units", and "fail_on_unknown_entity" to control the import process.

method.name: get_file_info
method.description: Returns information about the reader and its current state, including transfer settings, precision, and any errors.

method.name: get_all_shapes
method.description: Returns an array of all shapes found in the last loaded file. Currently returns an empty array (implementation planned for future versions).

method.name: set_transfer_colors
method.description: Enables or disables the transfer of color information from IGES files during import.

method.name: get_transfer_colors
method.description: Returns true if color transfer is enabled.

method.name: set_transfer_names
method.description: Enables or disables the transfer of name/label information from IGES files during import.

method.name: get_transfer_names
method.description: Returns true if name transfer is enabled.

method.name: set_transfer_layers
method.description: Enables or disables the transfer of layer information from IGES files during import.

method.name: get_transfer_layers
method.description: Returns true if layer transfer is enabled.

method.name: set_precision
method.description: Sets the precision value used during IGES import. Lower values result in higher precision but slower import times.

method.name: get_precision
method.description: Returns the current precision setting for IGES import.

method.name: get_last_error
method.description: Returns the last error message encountered during import operations.

method.name: has_error
method.description: Returns true if there was an error in the last operation.

method.name: clear_error
method.description: Clears the current error state and message.

method.name: validate_file
method.description: Validates whether a file can be read as an IGES file without fully importing it. Returns true if the file appears to be a valid IGES file.

method.name: get_supported_extensions
method.description: Returns an array of supported file extensions for IGES files: ["iges", "igs"].

method.name: get_entity_count
method.description: Returns the number of entities in the last loaded IGES file. Currently returns 0 (implementation planned for future versions).

method.name: get_file_statistics
method.description: Returns statistical information about the last loaded IGES file, including entity count and transfer settings.

method.name: get_type
method.description: Returns the class type name "ocgd_iges_reader".

method.name: is_null
method.description: Returns false (readers are never considered null).
